title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 210.40 - Arbitration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 210.40 - Arbitration

State Regulations
(a) Alternative method of dispute resolution by arbitration. Where the Chief

Administrator of the Courts has established this arbitration program, Part 28
of the Rules of the Chief Judge (22 NYCRR Part
28
) shall control the
proceedings. (b) Where
the parties agree to arbitrate a claim under UCCA 206, arbitration proceedings
shall be conducted in accordance with CPLR article 75. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
210.40

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
